title: (x) SOLARIS 70s modular geometric stencil type - various alternatives {gang}
content:
Anybody know the name of this 70’s looking block type that spells out SOLARIS? Any help would be very much appreciated. THANKS!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090608103004im_/http:/typophile.com/files/solaris_5435.jpg)
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content: this is most likely a logotype... but the lowercase reminds me of Sinaloa and their might even be a little Revue in there as well.
hmm i see the sinaloa in terms of the outer shape but not so much the revue. i could have sworn i’ve seen this font somewhere else....
lex your choice is the closest yet!!!

At a freelance gig today (it was my last day there), while looking for something else, I saw a font called **Disco** that is very close to the SOLARIS title — except for the capital A, which had a rounded top... I hate to say this, but I was scrambling to finish a project and didn’t have time to see who the manufacturer was... Now I am at home and haven’t been able to find it via Google... :-(
Not the same but Canada Type [Stock](http://web.archive.org/web/20090608103004/http:/www.canadatype.com/showfont.php?id=44) has the style and quite a few alternates.

The S looks like Font Bureaus [Alpha Bloc Sculpture](http://web.archive.org/web/20090608103004/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/alpha_bloc_sculpture/) and the O and the R like Monotypes [Braggadocio](http://web.archive.org/web/20090608103004/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=205270). In this genre I also like to suggest Ole Søndergaard and Morten Rostgaard Olsens nice, simple and quite new font [Palina](http://web.archive.org/web/20090608103004/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontpartners/fp_palina/)...
THANKS SO MUCH FOR ALL THE HELP GUYS!

Hey... [**In this other thread the font Disco is mentioned**](http://web.archive.org/web/20090608103004/http:/typophile.com/node/34443)... Apparently it is really called [**Outland**](http://web.archive.org/web/20090608103004/http:/www.buyfonts.com/value_for_money/outland.htm)... or maybe that is just a cheaper version of it... Can’t tell. Pretty similar to the font used for Solaris above.
Nice sighting, Ricardo! Outland is very close, except for the A...
